data.text: Iminriang sangai angnga, Pathian omchan kajui kha eru.
Christa in eini inaminriang khat-um eini sik-ah Pathian diang arim kahoi sik-ah apumtak inpesuok-ah nanphalpi angnga, inriang lamma siru. Suok 29:18; Minpkla 40:6
Takkha zool-inthai halli inthiangmak emakli kara-ot iti ngaihi nangni suungnga araming-um rilmarasu, ajarchu inthiang Pathian mi ngaisik akatha kha emak.
Chongkase karil, ka-am chongril, khalook chong apha elekleiya akaril daru, takkha khawa rathuulla Pathian minpaakna chong rilru.
Inthiangnga jetru, zool-inthai, apum inthiangmak emakli mi ngaita kara-ot miring kha (ramil chubei katho mi kha eii) Christa khat-um Pathian rengram kha luuttheinuni.
Tuteii inkhat innum nangni kha nemna kaboi chong khan lamleiitiang nakeiruoi marasu, ajarchu hiwa ngai jarra chongkajuimak mi ngaidiang Pathian raangna kha kajuotungsik kha eii.
Khawa jarra inmani ngaile inchun suomma chuon thomaru.
Apha matiang akaziing khan ningleiom, takkha tuunchu Pumi diang warkha ning ejei; war sangai angnga siru,
ajarchu war5:9: war; manuscripts lekkhat achu Ratha tia injia. kara khachu akatha, katuun khat-um akadik ngaihi in-eii,
halli Pumi malung tainasik ngaikha entokru.
Akara kaboi aziingna munna chuonkatho ngaile inchunmaru, khawa rathuulla inmani ngaikha malarru.
Ajarchu inmani ngai'n aziing na-ah intho chuon ngaikha rilsik um jakna om.
Takkha war khan jowar phakhan angrakip ngaikha inhong inlarjei, halli inmani nunchan ngaikha inthiangnga inlarjei.
Khawa jarra hin tia aril,
Khawa jarra singtheiya ringru. Ka-am emaru kasing kha eru.
Apha kacha ningmuna rakip kasingnga inliing naru, ajarchu aphahi thakhaimakjei. Col 4:5
Khawa jarra amkhai maru, takkha Pumi lungdou kha jettru.
Halli ju inruimaru, ajarchu khawa khan napum aminmangsik eii; khawa rathuulla Ratha ah sipru.
Ningmalung pumpuiya inpaak, minpaak laa, khat-um ratha laa kha karok-ah Pumi diang sak inlang inkhatli inkhat inkookru.
Pumi Jisu Christa ramingnga, ang rakip sik-ah Pa Pathian kha amun rakip-ah minpaakru. Col 3:16,17
Christa khoya nithole inruoiya inkhat in inkhat nuoiya omru.
Numei ngai Pumi nuoiya ningom angnga ningruothar ngai nuoiya omru. Col 3:18; 1 Pet 3:1
Ajarchu Christa in koisuok lu i-eii angnga aruothar khan anumei lu eii; halli Christa apumtak in ama taksa, koisuok kakatanpa eii.
Koisuok khan Christa nuoiya i-om angnga, nupuinu ngai'n ang rakip-ah inruothar nuoiya omrasu.
Christa in koisuok kha aminriang jarra aringkhuo ipeii angnga, pakhat ngai ningnumei ngaikha minriangru. Col 3:19; 1 Pet 3:7
Koisuok kha tuiya aminthiang suoli, Pathian diang pesik-ah chongnga ama'n aminthiangsik eii,
khachu koisuok kha kapoiya, abi khat-um kazuur omlekleiya, takkha inthiang khat-um kachok omlekleiya amadiang apenasik eii.
Inruothar ngai'n innumei kha inpumtak inminriang angnga inminriangsik eii. Innumei kaminriang kha inpumtak kaminriang kha eii.
Tuteii um apum kaminriangmak mi ommu, takkha Christa in koisuok sik-ah itho angnga, eini'n nipum niwai khat-um katha-ah nibool,
ajarchu eini ngaihi ama pumma kaom saram ngaikha ni-eii.
“Hiwasik jarra pasal khan anu apa kha mathaanta halli anumei khale inchunsik eii, halli inmani inni kha pum khatbit in esik eii.”
Hiwahi inphumma kaom akadik kha eii, takkha kei'n Christa li Koisuok jarra kiril kha eii.
Khale inruoiya nangni rakip in ningpumtak ningminriang angnga ningnumei kha minriangru, halli anumei khan aruothar kha khoya thorase.
